content:
Based on our previous calculations and considering the additional requirements, here are the updated detailed specifications for Pig:

* MTOW: 3,600 kg
	+ Payload (5 passengers and baggage): 600 kg
	+ Fuel (400 km range): 900 kg
	+ Fuel cell: 100 kg
	+ Battery: 600 kg
	+ Structure: 850 kg
	+ Avionics: 150 kg
	+ Systems: 200 kg
	+ Other equipment: 100 kg
* Dimensions:
	+ Length: 12 m
	+ Height: 4 m
	+ Wingspan: 13 m
	+ Main rotor diameter: 8 m
	+ Tail rotor diameter: 1.5 m
	+ Cabin length: 3.5 m
	+ Cabin width: 2 m
	+ Cabin height: 1.5 m

Please note that these are estimated values based on our assumptions and could be subject to change during the design and testing phases.
